lead_paragraph: With the Olympic swimming finals ending in the early morning hours, Michael Phelps has a quick turnaround before he's due back at the pool.

headline.main: Phelps' Formula After Late-Night Finals: Pound Pasta, Sleep
headline.print_headline: Phelps' Formula After Late-Night Finals: Pound Pasta, Sleep
